tool.name: parallel blast
tool.command:
#if str($blast_db) != 'None': uncompress_tgz.py -i $blast_db -o blast_db; BLAST_DB_NAME=`get_blast_db_path.py -i blast_db`; #end if parallel_blast.py -i $infile_path -o parallel_blast_output #if $disable_low_complexity_filter: -c #end if
#if $e_value: -e $e_value #end if
#if $num_hits: -n $num_hits #end if
#if $word_size: -w $word_size #end if
#if str($blastmat_dir): -a $blastmat_dir #end if
#if str($refseqs_path) != 'None': -r $refseqs_path #end if
#if str($blast_db) != 'None': -b \$BLAST_DB_NAME #end if
#if $jobs_to_start: -O $jobs_to_start #end if
#if $retain_temp_files: -R #end if
#if $poll_directly: -T #end if
#if $suppress_polling: -W #end if
#if str($job_prefix): -X $job_prefix #end if
#if $seconds_to_sleep: -Z $seconds_to_sleep #end if ; compress_path.py -i parallel_blast_output -o $output_dir

param.label: -i/--infile_path: Path of sequences to use as queries [REQUIRED]
param.name: infile_path

param.label: -c/--disable_low_complexity_filter: disable filtering of low-complexity sequences (i.e., -F F is passed to blast) [default: False]
param.name: disable_low_complexity_filter

param.label: -n/--num_hits: number of hits per query for blast results [default: 1]
param.name: num_hits

param.label: -a/--blastmat_dir: full path to directory containing blastmat file [default: /home/kevin/qiime_software/blast-2.2.22-release/data]
param.name: blastmat_dir

param.label: -r/--refseqs_path: Path to fasta sequences to search against. Required if -b is not provided.
param.name: refseqs_path

param.label: -b/--blast_db: Name of pre-formatted BLAST database. Required if -r is not provided.
param.name: blast_db

param.label: -R/--retain_temp_files: retain temporary files after runs complete (useful for debugging) [default: False]
param.name: retain_temp_files

param.label: -T/--poll_directly: Poll directly for job completion rather than running poller as a separate job. If -T is specified this script will not return until all jobs have completed. [default: False]
param.name: poll_directly

param.label: -W/--suppress_polling: suppress polling of jobs and merging of results upon completion [default: False]
param.name: suppress_polling

param.label: -X/--job_prefix: job prefix [default: descriptive prefix + random chars]
param.name: job_prefix

param.label: -Z/--seconds_to_sleep: Number of seconds to sleep between checks for run completion when polling runs [default: 60]
param.name: seconds_to_sleep

tool.help: This script for performing blast while making use of multicore/multiprocessor environments to perform analyses in parallel.
